skillTree.name: Skeleton Chariot
skillTree.description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.

skillTree.name: Skeletal Steed
skillTree.description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.

skillTree.name: Ceremonial Bandages
skillTree.description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.

skillTree.name: Embalmed in Elixir
skillTree.description: The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Cultist Prince
skillTree.description: The firstborn son of a Tomb King is given to the gods, where he may serve the future itself as part of the Mortuary Cult.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Heir of the Chariot King
skillTree.description: The second son of a second son shall succeed his father when the time comes. It is the custom.

skillTree.name: Royal Lieutenant
skillTree.description: The younger sons of a Tomb King command detachments within his armies, ensuring their father's unshakeable, iron will is enacted to the letter.

skillTree.name: Restless Minions
skillTree.description: In Nehekhara, those sworn to serve its rulers do not stay 'properly' dead for long.

skillTree.name: Knowing the land
skillTree.description: Fighting inside or outside nehekhara is the same has long as we have maps of the land.

skillTree.name: Master Tactict
skillTree.description: Nyletoth is a master of the chariot and won many battles fighting from his prized golden vehicle pulled by a team of the finest Khemrian stallions.

skillTree.name: Strike Harder
skillTree.description: As undead don't retire they can keep fighting at maximum strength during the whole battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Skeleton Chariots and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Cunning Maneuvers
skillTree.description: Chariots may seem unwieldy in large formations but Nyletoth's tactics allow his army to flank even entretched armies.

effects.description: Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Nyletoth the Charioteer

Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Tomb Princes on Chariots
	(Hero's army)
Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Nyletoth the Charioteer

Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Tomb Princes on Chariots
	(Hero's army)
Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Nyletoth the Charioteer

skillTree.name: Charioteer Outmaneuvering
skillTree.description: In death, Nyletoth remains a master charioteer and often leads a large formation of chariots in battle.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Charioteer Outmaneuvering" for Nyletoth the Charioteer

Passive ability: "Charioteer Outmaneuvering" for Tomb Princes on Chariots
	(Hero's army)
Passive ability: "Charioteer Outmaneuvering" for Nyletoth the Charioteer

Passive ability: "Charioteer Outmaneuvering" for Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Charioteer Outmaneuvering" for Tomb Princes on Chariots
	(Hero's army)
Passive ability: "Charioteer Outmaneuvering" for Nyletoth the Charioteer

skillTree.name: Indomitable Will
skillTree.description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.

skillTree.name: Conqueror
skillTree.description: Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Tombstrike
skillTree.description: He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit: death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Over My Dead Body
skillTree.description: Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.

skillTree.name: Desertstrike
skillTree.description: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Canopic Jar Hoarder
skillTree.description: These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

backgroundSkills.name: The Charioteer
backgroundSkills.description: In life, Nyletoth loved nothing better than horses and charioteering. In death, he remains a master charioteer and often leads a large formation of chariots in battle.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -25% for Chariot buildings
	(local province)

Recruit rank: +1 for Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Hero's army)
Melee attack: +8 on Skeleton Chariot mount
Melee defence: +8 on Skeleton Chariot mount

items.name: Crook and Flail of Radiance
items.description: These gleaming, golden weapons represent the high status of the bearer, and all in his presence are humbled by the aura of majesty these weapons convey.

effects.description: Grants Weapon: "Crook and Flail of Radiance"
